definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Incineration of pyrolysis with recovery of bromine or hydrobromic acid.
sentences.chinese: 焚燒或裂解以回收溴或氫溴酸。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the stability of the controlled-release pellets of dextromethorphan hydrobromide.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察氫溴酸右美沙芬控釋膠囊的穩定性。

sentences.english: By the reaction of mannitol and hydrobromic acid.
sentences.chinese: 由甘露醇與氫溴酸反應制得。
